channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘She is single and has a low-wage job’: I want to give my daughter, who is in her 30s, $50,000 for retirement. What could go wrong?
item.description: “She can invest aggressively, as she has over two decades to see her principal grow.”

item.title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Slip; Oracle Stock Sells Off
item.description: The S&P 500, Nasdaq Composite and Dow Jones Industrial Average all slipped as investors’ obsession with technology cut both ways.

item.title: Walgreens Is in Talks to Sell Itself to Private-Equity Firm Sycamore Partners
item.description: Deal would cap tumultuous run for retailer whose market value shrank from a peak of over $100 billion to below $8 billion.

item.title: Gold Closes Back In On $2,700/oz
item.description: Front-month gold futures settled up 1.2%, at $2,697.60 an ounce, its third consecutive gain and the highest close in over two weeks.

item.title: I’m 42 and married with no kids. I have $114K in a 401(k) and $1,400 in credit-card debt. How can I grow my wealth?
item.description: “I am not that familiar with investing, but currently educating myself about it.”

item.title: I’m a 59-year-old recluse with PTSD, a cancer diagnosis and no living relatives. What should I do with my $900,000 life savings?
item.description: “I have a large bank as trustee, and it will take a large chunk to distribute my estate.”

item.title: UBS Extends Its U.S. Wealth Arm to Serve More Than Just the Ultrarich
item.description: Chasing higher margins, and rivals, the bank’s U.S. boss is making a move for more clients and banking services.

item.title: Federal judge blocks Kroger-Albertsons merger, says it would ‘remove competition’
item.description: A federal judge has blocked supermarket chain Kroger Co.’s merger with rival Albertsons Cos., saying it would stifle competition in the grocery indust...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Settle Near Flat
item.description: Natural gas futures recovered from early losses and ended the session little changed as the market moved with volatile winter weather forecasts. The N...

item.title: GameStop’s stock jumps on surprise third-quarter profit
item.description: Shares of GameStop Corp. were up 8.2% in extended trading after the videogame retailer reported a surprise third-quarter profit, despite falling sales...
